abstract: Kei Nishikori defeats Leonardo Mayer to advance to Citi Open tennis tournament quarterfinals; other tennis matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Nishikori moved into his 11th ATP quarterfinal of the season by beating 16th-seeded Leonardo Mayer, 6-4, 6-4, at the Citi Open in Washington.
snippet: Nishikori moved into his 11th ATP quarterfinal of the season by beating 16th-seeded Leonardo Mayer, 6-4, 6-4, at the Citi Open in Washington.
